title: Official Kotlin Documentation
description: The official Kotlin documentation by JetBrains, covering all aspects from setting up the environment to detailed features of the language.

title: Kotlin Tutorial - Programiz
description: Learn Kotlin from the basics with Programiz's easy-to-understand tutorials, examples, and exercises.

title: Kotlin - Tutorialspoint
description: A comprehensive tutorial by Tutorialspoint that introduces Kotlin and covers its syntax, data types, control statements, classes, and more.

title: Kotlin Tutorial - GeeksforGeeks
description: A series of detailed tutorials and articles on Kotlin provided by GeeksforGeeks, suitable for beginners and advanced programmers alike.

title: Kotlin Tutorial - JavaTpoint
description: JavaTpoint offers a Kotlin tutorial that covers fundamental and advanced topics, including Kotlin environment setup and integration with Android.

title: Learn Kotlin in Y Minutes
description: Quickly grasp the syntax and basic constructs of Kotlin with this concise tutorial from Learn X in Y Minutes.
